title: Luxury Apartment in Downtown Houston
posting_body: ['For leasing info, call or text', 'show contact info', 'Ask about ID#: 1395A', 'Wake up and wind down amongst the luxury comforts of your downtown apartment.', 'Each residence comes adorned with quality finishes.', 'From stainless steel appliances to granite countertops, you will see uncompromising attention to detail.', 'Marvel at floor-to-ceiling windows that brighten the stylish layouts and step out onto private balconies that offer awe-inspiring views of downtown.', 'Residents wake up to the sweeping skyline landscape and fall asleep with twinkling city lights.', 'These apartment also offer a number of conveniences, including large closets and impressive kitchens with stainless steel appliances and granite countertops.', 'Here comfort, style and convenience merge for an inspired living experience.', 'Community Amenities:', '- Laundry Facility', '- Pet Friendly Community', '- Garage Parking Available', '- 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance', '- 24 Hour Amazon Package Concierge System', '- Uber Official Drop off & Pick up location', '- Spectacular Movie Room with Theater Seating', '- Boutique Lobby with 24-Hour Concierge Services', '- Indoor Pool Table & Regulation Sized Basketball Court', '- 9th Floor Heated Swimming Pool with Sun Terrace & Lounges', '- Paperless Community', '- 24 Hour Business Lounge with Conference Room & Wi-Fi Terrace', '- Open Air Custom Game Veranda with Ping Pong & Foosball Tables', '- Grilling Stations & a Fire Pit with Panoramic Skyline Views of Houston', '- Expansive 24-Hour Fitness Center with Strenght & Cardio Conditioning Equipment', '- Within walking distance from Countless Restaurants & Bars, serving everything from upscale Cuisine', 'Apartment Amenities:', '-Stand Up Shower - Guest Bath', '- High Speed Internet Access', '- Granite Countertops', '- Refrigerator', '- Air Conditioning & Heat', '- Dishwasher', '- Private Balcony', '- Penthouse Options Available', '- Additional Storage', '- Travertine Floor Tile', '- Range', '- Floor to Ceiling Windows', '- Laminate Wood Floors', '- Large Closets', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Subway Tile Backsplash']
